# amazon-website-clone
I have tried to create an amazon clone website by using different programmimg languages..
## HTML code

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Amazon Clone</title>
    <style>
    </style>
</head>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css"
<body>
    <header>
        <nav>
            <a href="#" class="logo">Amazon Clone</a>
            <div class="search-bar">
                <input type="text" placeholder="Search for products">
                <button>Search</button>
            </div>
            <ul class="nav-links">
                <li><a href="#">Sign In</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Cart</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Products</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">About</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
                
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <div class="content">
        <h1><b>Featured Products</b></h1>
        <div class="product-grid">
            <div class="product-card">
                <img class="product-image" src=data:image/jpeg;base64, alt="Echo Dot (5th Gen)">
                <h3 class="product-title">Echo Dot (5th Gen)</h3>
                <p class="product-price">$29.99</p>
                <a href="#">Buy Now</a>
            </div>
            <div class="product-card">
                <img class="product-image" src=https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSlsuhMfew7a1ShDiLinQ2P5PwySNvS4MgtEA&s alt="Fire TV Stick 4K Max">
                <h3 class="product-title">Fire TV Stick 4K Max</h3>
                <p class="product-price">$39.99</p>
                <a href="#">Buy Now</a>
            </div>
            <div class="product-card">
                <img class="product-image" src=data:image/jpeg;base64, alt="Refrigerator">
                <h3 class="product-title">Refrigerator</h3>
                <p class="product-price">$799.99</p>
                <a href="#">Buy Now</a>
            </div>
            <div class="product-card">
                <img class="product-image" src=data:image/jpeg;base64, alt="Washing Machine">
                <h3 class="product-title">Washing Machine</h3>
                <p class="product-price">$599.99</p>
                <a href="#">Buy Now</a>
            </div>

                <img class="product-image" src=data:image/jpeg;base64, alt="Microwave Oven">

    </footer>
</body>
</html>

## CSS code 
/* Basic Styling */
body {
    font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    background-color: #f0f2f5;
}

header {
    background-color: #131921;
    color: white;
    padding: 10px 0;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

nav {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 20px;
}

.logo {
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0c14b; /* Amazon yellow color */
    text-decoration: none; /* Remove underline from logo link */
}

.search-bar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 5px;
}

input[type="text"] {
    padding: 10px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    width: 400px;
    font-size: 16px;
}

input[type="text"]:focus {
    outline: none;
}

button {
    padding: 10px 15px;
    background-color: #f0c14b;
    color: black;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 16px;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease; /* Smooth transition for hover effect */
    margin-left: 10px;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #ddb347; /* Slightly darker yellow on hover */
}

.nav-links {
    display: flex;
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.nav-links li {
    margin-left: 20px;
}

.nav-links a {
    color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.nav-links a:hover {
    color: #f0c14b; /* Yellow on hover */
}

/* Content Section */
.content {
    padding: 20px;
}

.product-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    grid-gap: 20px;
}

.product-card {
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Subtle shadow */
    transition: transform 0.2s ease; /* Animation for hover */
}

.product-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* Increased shadow on hover */
}

.product-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: 250px;
    object-fit: contain; /* Ensures the image fits within the container without distortion */
}

.product-title {
    margin-top: 10px;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 18px;
}

.product-price {
    margin-top: 5px;
    color: #f0c14b;
    font-size: 16px;
}

/* Footer */
footer {
    background-color: #131921;
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 15px 0;
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1000;
}
